description: The Fenix E28R V2.0 Rechargeable EDC Flashlight is a great flashlight packed full of features for everyday use. This flashlight can shine a maximum of 1700 lumens at a distance of 896ft (273m). Powered by an included 18650 (3400mAh) Li-ion battery, this flashlight is fully rechargeable via its USB Type-C charging port. A convenient side switch activates all lighting modes and includes a battery level indicator—helping you always know the status of your battery. Activate the pulse light for a great indicator light to know where you left your light. A two-way body clip and a magnetic base offer different hands-free lighting methods. Waterproof and dustproof, the Fenix E28R V2.0 Rechargeable Flashlight is a great everyday carry tool.
name: E28R V2.0 Flashlight - 1700-Lumens

specs.value: Seven lighting modes; including five brightness levels, strobe, and pulse light
One included 18650 li-ion rechargeable battery or two CR123A lithium batteries
ARB-L18-3400 battery, USB Type-C charging cable, lanyard, spare O-ring
